title: Homemade Vanilla Ice Cream
description: Creamy, smooth vanilla ice cream made from scratch
instructions: Split vanilla bean lengthwise and scrape out seeds.
Combine cream, milk, sugar, vanilla seeds and pod, and salt in a saucepan.
Heat over medium heat until sugar dissolves, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature.
Remove vanilla pod and refrigerate mixture for at least 2 hours.
Pour into ice cream maker and churn according to manufacturer instructions.
Transfer to freezer-safe container and freeze for 2-4 hours until firm.
